explains: adj. 现实生活的；工作的

sentences.en: Teachers need to prepare their students to deal with real-world situations outside the classroom.
sentences.cn: 教师应该让学生作好应对课堂以外的现实世界的准备。

sentences.en: Politicians seem to be out of touch with the real world.
sentences.cn: 政治家们似乎不接触现实世界。

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 孩子也许无法区分想像与真实世界的差别。
